Wildfire:




Wildfire perked up her ears. She heard a voice on her comm 
(Thrust's). She thought she would never hear one again. She got 
readings of solitude from the owner. He must be lost. Her Predacon 
instincts led her to him, following his presence, to the edge of a 
forest, as far as she would go. The black mare stayed there, and 
returned with him a :~Hello. Now run.~ She flashed the image of 
flashing teeth and the huge wolf at him to tell him what she meant 
through her psyhic ablities.
